entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one tugging on the rope around Buckbeak's neck. He is trying to make Buckbeak move faster.

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: Buckbeak is a hippogriﬀ that Harry is trying to make move faster by tugging on the rope around its neck.

entities.name: macnair
entities.description: Macnair is someone who needs to sign something, as mentioned by Dumbledore's voice.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the one talking from within the cabin and asking Macnair to sign something.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is hiding behind a tree and trying to help Harry by adding her weight to make Buckbeak move faster.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid's back door has opened with a bang, indicating that he might be involved in the scene.

relationships.description: Harry is tugging on the rope around Buckbeak's neck to make it move faster.
